errorFileSize: Could not upload file. Filesize (4 mb) might be exceeded.
errorDownloadExpired: Could not download file. Files expired.
helpText:
usage: app.js [--help] [--dir <path>] [--ip <ip-address>] [--port <port number>] [--mxSize <size in MB>] 

	'--dir'		:	Directory for uploaded files. Needs to end with a '/'. 
				(Default: './uploads/')
	'--ip'		:	The IP users connect to in browser. Examples: 'www.example.com' & 'example.com:8080'. Do not include 'http://'. 
				(Default: 'localhost:8080') 
	'--port'	:	The port will listen to packets on. 
				(Default: '8080') 
	'--mxSize'	:	Maximum size for user uploaded files in MB. 
				(Default: '14')
